heading: Inclusivity
content: Whether I'm designing or coding, I want to make every website, product and interface as intuitive, inclusive and enjoyable as possible.

heading: Mentoring
content: I highly value learning and like to give back to others where I can. I'm particularly keen to mentor tech-curious women, non-binary people and any other minorities in our sector.

heading: Animal Welfare
content: A few years ago I went vegetarian because I want to treat animals well. I'm not preachy with it, I just enjoy cooking plant-based food and adore my cats.
